vsParam:
Um... Red Cap.
It's a tough opponent...

Oh, it's you. I'm here to investigate how much damage these Goblins
caused... Given the situation, I think you've defeated Red Cap?

Yeah, totally!
We blew it out of the water!

Oh, thank you!
Thank you so much!

You're welcome. We're neighbors living in Albus,
so we're supposed to look after each other!
... Hmm? [px], what is it in your hand...

Huh? Ru Sensei, you know this emerald board?
We found it in the Goblins' den...

You mean it's taken from people?
If it's the genuine one...

What do you mean if it's the genuine one!?
Is it super good!? What kind of special power does it have!?

No, I don't know for sure at this point.
There are many counterfeits of it.

[px], could you give it to me for now?
I'd like to examine it.
Please... Please take good care of it.

Yeah, don't worry.
I won't break it.

What do you take me for? I'm Archsage Ru.
Don't worry, I won't break it.
Please... Please take good care of it.

Yeah, don't worry.
I won't break it.

What do you take me for? I'm Archsage Ru.
Don't worry, I won't break it.

We'll find out the secret of this emerald board
if we leave it to Sensei.

OK. I'm going back to the Academy now.
I'll let you know right after I finish examining it.

So, Head Bilberry.
I'll give you the damage report later.

And you, you've been a great help.
I'll repay your favor, definitely!

Haha, it's no big deal. You're welcome.
We should get going as well!
